db:info.db:title: TextInputManager QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Wayland Compositor | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Provides access to input methods in the compositor.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The TextInputManager corresponds to the zwp_text_input_manager_v2 interface in the text_input_unstable_v2 extension protocol.
Instantiating this as child of a WaylandCompositor adds it to the list of interfaces available to the client. If a client binds to it, then it will be used to communciate text input to that client.
